statements: UPSERT INTO media (id, title, type) VALUES (1, 'Example Title 1', 'Example Type 1')
UPSERT INTO media (id, title, type) VALUES (2, 'Example Title 2', 'Example Type 2')
UPSERT INTO media (id, title, type) VALUES (3, 'Example Title 3', 'Example Type 3')
INSERT INTO Media (title, type) VALUES ('Movie', 'Video') ON CONFLICT (title) DO UPDATE SET type = EXCLUDED.type, updated_at = now();
INSERT INTO Media (title, type) VALUES ('Song', 'Audio') ON CONFLICT (title) DO UPDATE SET type = EXCLUDED.type, updated_at = now();
INSERT INTO Media (title, type) VALUES ('Book', 'Text') ON CONFLICT (title) DO UPDATE SET type = EXCLUDED.type, updated_at = now();

INSERT INTO Media (media_id, title, type, published_date) VALUES (1, 'Example Media 1', 'Book', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (media_id) DO UPDATE SET title = 'Updated Example Media 1', type = 'Book', published_date = '2022-01-01';
INSERT INTO MediaAuthors (media_id, author_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT MediaAuthors_media_id_author_id_key DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO MediaReviews (review_id, media_id, user_id, rating, review_text) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 5, 'Great book!') ON CONFLICT (review_id) DO UPDATE SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Great book!'

UPSERT INTO Media (id, title, type, release_year) VALUES (1, 'Movie ABC', 'Movie', 2021) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = excluded.title, type = excluded.type, release_year = excluded.release_year
UPSERT INTO Media_Actors (media_id, actor_name) VALUES (1, 'John Doe') ON CONFLICT (media_id, actor_name) DO NOTHING
UPSERT INTO Media_Genres (media_id, genre_name) VALUES (1, 'Action') ON CONFLICT (media_id, genre_name) DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO media_content (id, title, description, publish_date) VALUES ('1f6f8b71-75c0-49fe-b674-61d3b60b1809', 'Sample Title 1', 'Sample Description 1', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = excluded.title, description = excluded.description, publish_date = excluded.publish_date;
INSERT INTO media_category (id, category_name) VALUES ('33feb40b-69b0-4f77-96e2-59e1bbecfa60', 'Music') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET category_name = excluded.category_name;
INSERT INTO media_type (id, type_name) VALUES ('8674f8d6-3b69-4ec0-bb70-92a8e20a3cf9', 'Video') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET type_name = excluded.type_name;
